comments:
In new build.properties editor, CTRL-F yields:
Error Apr 30, 2004 13:38:49.266 The command for the key you pressed failed

Just tried to reproduce this again and although the Ctrl-F is fine, I have a
similar problem with Ctrl-Z with a ClassCastException flavour (when
build.properties editor is embedded in new manifest editor). :(

This particular problem has been fixed, but until the related key binding 
issue is fixed in the editor support, use menu bar actions to issue commands 
like cut/copy/paste/delete, undo/redo etc.

Cherie, can you retry this problem and see if it is still current (now that we 
have a fix for the key binding fix from the UI team)?
Verified fix has been made by UI team :-)
